sentences.en: Arrests were made which promised elucidation, yet nothing was elicited which could implicate the parties suspected.
sentences.cn: 逮捕了几帮人,原以为案子就有分晓,谁知还是一无结果,那几帮嫌疑犯跟这案子毫无关系.

sentences.en: Bohm outlined his approach in the classic 1980 book,'Wholeness and the Implicate Order '.
sentences.cn: 玻姆在他1980年的经典书籍介绍了他的方法,'整体和关联秩序 '.

sentences.en: Come what may, i'll brace myself and face the music . i'd rather die than implicate others!
sentences.cn: 好汉做事好汉当, 我死就死,决不连累旁人.

sentences.en: He didn't find anything in the notebooks to implicate Stu.
sentences.cn: 他在笔记本中没发现任何涉及斯图的东西。

sentences.en: He tried to avoid saying anything that would implicate him further.
sentences.cn: 他尽力避免说出任何会进一步牵连他的事情。

sentences.en: His enemies tried to implicate him ( in the murder ).
sentences.cn: 他的仇人竭力想把他牵扯进谋杀案中.

sentences.en: His investigation would eventually implicate his brother in the crime.
sentences.cn: 萨戈罗的调查最终显示他的哥哥涉嫌此案.

sentences.en: I do not want to implicate you in my problem of the job.
sentences.cn: 我工作上的问题不想把你也牵扯进来.

sentences.en: It was easier to confess everything and implicate everybody.
sentences.cn: 把什么东西都招认,把什么人都拉下水,是很容易的事.

sentences.en: Recognition memory dual - processing models implicate distinct retrieval processes of familiarity and recollection.
sentences.cn: 双加工模型认为再认记忆有两种不同的形式:熟悉性和回想.

sentences.en: Serious must implicate entire face even whole body.
sentences.cn: 严重者要累及整个面部甚至全身.

sentences.en: Taken together , our results implicate that the PCM is a cheap and reliable thermal management solution.
sentences.cn: 把我们的分析结果总结起来,结果表明PCM是一种便宜和可靠的热能管理解决方案.

sentences.en: The allegations implicated Abe to such an extent he was forced to resign.
sentences.cn: 安倍深受指控牵连，不得不辞职。

sentences.en: The minister s confession implicate numerous official in the bribery scandal.
sentences.cn: 那部长的供词把很多官员牵连到受贿丑闻中.
他们会招供的，他们会把我牵连进去的。

words.tran_cn: 纠缠（implicate的过去式和过去分词）
暗示；使牵连其中；含有…的意思

trans.tran_cn: 使牵连其中, 含意, 暗示
trans.tran_en: to show or suggest that someone is involved in a crime or dishonest act

trans.tran_cn: 牵涉，涉及（某人），表明（或意指）…是起因，暗示
